question:
Which among the following matches are correct?
1. Very Dense Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 70% or more
2. Moderately Dense Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 40% and more but less than 70%
3. Open Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 10% and more but less than 40%
4. Scrub Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of less than 10%
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The correct pairs are Very Dense Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 70% or more, Moderately Dense Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 40% and more but less than 70%, Open Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of 10% and more but less than 40%, Scrub Forest- Lands with tree canopy density of less than 10%.
